runs.comm: starts with a length ball that swings from Hafeez, a thick outside edge and towards deep backward point for four
similar length closer to off stump this time, defended off the front foot in front of point
shuffles across the stumps, skips down the track as well, trying to throw the bowler off his line and length, Cummins keeps it on a length outside off, defended to point again

massive appeal for lbw from Cummins as he gets one to swing sharply in, Hafeez is late to get his bat down and that thuds into his pads in front of middle and off, that looked pretty close, Hafeez lucky to survive
this time the ball doesn't dip in, holds the line and a thick outside edge races down to the third man boundary

reaches out for this one and crashes it uppishly past a diving point for the third boundary of the over, it has actually been a pretty good over from Cummins but he has been taken for 12, in what is expected to be a low-scoring game
Starc starts with a short of length ball well outside off, left alone, was just close enough to the stumps to not be declared a wide
this time it is a wide, swinging down the leg side

brilliant delivery from Starc, that one swung one and Nazir was clueless about it, through the bat and pad gap and it crashes into middle stump, what a start to Starc's international T20 career, a duck for Imran Nazir
Starc getting the move to snake around, too far outside off to worry Jamshed
closer to off this time, but still not close enough to force Jamshed to play
this time Starc doesn't get it to move away from the left-hander, carries on with the angle and onto the pads, worked behind square leg
that one jags back sharply from back of a length, Hafeez is cramped around off, defends from the crease
too far outside off from Cummins
this time it is on off stump, careful defence from Jamshed
just outside off, defended towards mid-off for a quick single
jumps out of the crease this time Hafeez, defends it to the left of the bowler who fields
gets the outside edge once more, down to third man for a single

nothing going Cummins' way here, a terrific yorker from him, swinging towards the toes, Jamshed looks to jam his bat on that one but misses, strikes his back pad and runs away for four leg byes, more swing from Cummins here troubling the batsman
this time Cummins can't complain, a length ball outside off is crisply driven between cover and extra cover for four, another expensive Cummins over comes to an end
slower ball to start from Starc, pushed to extra cover
pitched up and that is firmly driven towards cover, doesn't place it too well Hafeez
full and around off, defended towards mid-off
length ball around off, defended towards point from the crease by Hafeez
length ball on the pads, not much movement this time for Starc, helped towards square leg
full ball just outside off, driven towards mid-off to end the over
Hafeez walks down the track as he negotiates that short of length ball, nicely driven towards mid-on, who has to dive to cut it off
short of length and on the pads, worked towards deep square leg for one more
short of length and outside off, Hafeez looks to cut that one but is beaten
Watson keeps it close to offstump, short of a length and not much room, tapped towards point
shorter and slower from Watson, Hafeez through with his pull earlier than the ball reached, connects only with fresh air
pitched up and Hafeez looks to thrash it down the ground, not the best timed shot, Bailey dives to his left at mid-on to stop that one
a length ball on middle and leg, cheeky from Hafeez, he moves across and paddles it down to fine leg for four
length ball on off stump, drops it to the off side and takes a quick single, nicely done by Hafeez
full and just outside off, Jamshed opens the face to squeeze that one towards point for one more
full and just outside off, Hafeez blocks it to the off side and sprints another single, Starc bowling well here but Australia can't stop the singles this over
slower from Starc, short as well, Jamshed delays his pull and sends the ball behind square leg for a fourth single in a row
full and outside off, poked towards cover, no single for Hafeez this time
length ball heading for legstump, defended towards midwicket
full and outside off, defended towards cover

dropped, by Michael Hussey, a sitter given how good an outfielder he is, that was slogged towards deep extra cover, Hussey had to move across to his left, Hussey made the ground and was well positioned to take it, somehow it spills out
defended back towards the bowler
flat, quick and wide from Hussey, Hafeez waits on the back foot and dinks it past the keeper for four to the third man boundary, cleverly done
Dan Christian starts with a back of length ball around off, chopped towards point
slightly wider this time from Christian, guided down to third man for a single
short of length once more, angling in, that was slower than Hafeez expected, the ball pops up to the right of the bowler as Hafeez looks to push that towards mid-on, wide of Christian though
short of length and well outside off, slogged towards deep midwicket
just outside off, carefully pushed off the back foot towards point
on middle and leg, swiped behind square leg for a tight single
on a length spinning away a touch, slapped towards point
tossed up this time, on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket
short from Hogg, Hafeez can't make the most of it, he gets on the back foot and slugs it towards deep midwicket for a single
quicker and outside off, dabbed towards cover for a quick single, Pakistan get to 50
murdered! pitched up and that is launched over the bowler's head by Hafeez, gets to the pitch and a powerful swing of the bat fetches him a boundary, that was the wrong 'un from Hogg
flighted and full, Hafeez skips away from leg and drives it back towards the bowler, Hogg can't field that one cleanly, gives away a single
full and slower from Watson outside off, driven along the ground towards mid-off for a single
short of length and on middle stump, defended to the leg side by Jamshed
just outside off, Jamshed waits on the back foot and guides it behind point for a single
length ball outside off, Hafeez gets on one knee as he swipes it towards long-on for a single
shorter and on leg stump, helped along to fine leg for a single
short of length ball on the stumps, Hafeez backs away from the stumps to make room to steer that behind point for a single
the boundaries may be big here in Dubai, but not big enough for Jamshed, he launches a length delivery from Hogg, Jamshed anxiously watched to see whether it would clear the long-on fielder, it does
swiped towards deep midwicket for a couple
an inside-out lofted drive, a dive at extra cover but that is too wide for him, two more
clips that against the spin, takes it from well outside off to work it towards midwicket
Hafeez backs away from the stumps, chops the ball towards point
spins away after pitching just outside off, played off the back foot towards backward point
short of length and angling away, slugged towards long-on for a single
full ball around leg stump, Hafeez skips away from the stumps and pushes it towards cover for a single
that was ordinary from Christian, a half-volley on the pads with the fine leg in the circle, "Thanks," says Jamshed as he glances that for four
defended towards cover for a single
short of length and outside off, Hafeez sweeps that towards deep backward square leg boundary, Hogg has to chase, he keeps it in but can't prevent three
driven to long-on for a single
a slower full toss to start the over, poor bowling this, put away past extra cover, powerfully put away
back of a length ball on off stump, defended towards point for a single

sensational catch from Dan Christian, even he can't believe it, a massive grin on his face as he gets up after plucking that one-handed blinder, set to be a Youtube classic that, Jamshed scooped that one over mid-off, Christian had to back-pedal, he had plenty of ground to cover, he wasn't going to make it so he puts in a full-length dive and stretches out his left hand, it sticks, and it doesn't pop out as he hits the ground, that could well be the catch of the year
Hafeez pulls a shortish delivery
no footwork at all as he swishes at a ball well outside off, a hopeful look at the umpire to ask whether that was a wide, no movement from the umpire
bowled from wide of the crease, angling in towards the stumps, that missed the off stump by a fraction after it beat the bat, Starc can't believe that isn't bowled

Kamran could have been out twice on that ball (and thrice this over already), first he is dropped by Starc as he punches that back towards the bowler, to the left of Starc who puts out his hand late, after that the ball is rolling towards mid-off, a run-out chance there at the non-striker's end as Kamran gives up, a direct hit would have sent him on his way
dropped by Watson at short cover, Hafeez scoops a low full ball towards Watson, who dives to his right and gets his hands on the ball but can't latch on it, no luck for Starc this over
full ball is slapped to deep extra cover for a couple
a full toss, off the toe end of the bat towards long-off
swiped towards deep square leg for a single

this time Australia take the catch, David Warner at long-on,Hafeez plays an ugly slog, the boundaries are massive here, there isn't enough on that to clear the rope, Warner was waiting, takes a good low catch, Watson will be relieved his drop in the previous over didn't cost him team that much
full ball is thrashed towards long-off

takes a step down the track even before Watson delivers , Watson sends it short of a length around off, defended towards cover, the two set off for a single before realising there isn't one, both scramble back in time
played with soft hands to the left of the pitch, single taken this time
short and wide, sliced towards the deep backward point boundary
a full toss on off stump, powered towards long-on for a single, five overs to go
a touch short on leg stump, reverse swept by Kamran
full ball is driven towards long-off
on the pads, looks to glance it  but it is off the pads towards short fine leg
wonderfully done by Kamran, a full toss on the pads, deftly sends it past Dan Christian at fine leg, Christian chases and puts in a full-length dive though he had no chance of stopping that
a touch short from Hogg, Kamran reverse-sweeps towards short third man, Umar was charging for the single, sent back by Kamran, nervous moment there for Umar
another full ball is swept, down towards deep backward square leg
a full toss, awful bowling that, it is hammered to the midwicket boundary, came down the track and gave it his all
a slower ball and that is slammed towards long-on, Warner is ridiculously quick, he is across in a flash to cut it off
length ball just outside off, down the ground and that is carved towards sweeper cover, pushes for the second
short of length this time, driven down towards long-off
amateurish this, a high full toss from Watson, slammed towards midwicket for four
much better from Watson, full and outside off, squeezed out behind point
that was outside leg stump, a top-edge lobbed to the vacant midwicket region, he was looking to sweep that squarer
well outside off, Kamran was looking for the reverse-sweep, bottom-edges it towards the keeper
flighted and full, just outside off, driven towards long-off
length ball on the stumps, driven towards long-off for one more
power! skips away from leg stump and bludgeons that low full toss over cover, no chance for sweeper cover to stop that bullet

more outstanding fielding from Christian, that was powerfully slammed towards the midwicket boundary, that looked a dead-cert boundary till Christian came in, he flung himself to his left and was in the air as he palmed the ball away from the rope, that was travelling fast, but not fast enough to beat Christian, the crowd gasps in awe as they see the replay on the giantscreen
short of length and outside off, flays it towards third man, drops short of the fielder
premeditated there, looking to glance that towards fine leg after moving across the stumps, too far outside off to pull that off

short and wide, looks to uppercut that to third man, edged through on the bounce to the keeper, a run out chance of Wade could get the direct hit, the Akmal brothers aren't the best runners in cricket
slapped towards deep midwicket for a single
anything Kamran can do, I can as well says Umar, he launches this over powerfully, inside-out over cover for four, 45 runs off 28 balls this partnership now
slower short of length ball outside off, guided to third man for a single
starts the over with wicket, slapped right to deep midwicket and Umar Akmal has to go, a slower delivery, length, that is right off the middle of the bat, but that isn't good enough to clear the rope
slower ball outside off, that is sliced away by Kamran, who threw his bat at that, not sure it was where he intended to hit it but Kamran won't mind
a full toss is muscled towards long-on for a single
short from Christian, batsman goes for the pull, top-edges it and it is in the air for a long time, lands short of long-on

slower bouncer down the leg side, fine leg was in the circle and Kamran will be disappointed at missing out, he just needed to place it past that fielder to get four, he can't beat that fielder though, Pakistan have reached 150
short of length, Razzaq went for an almighty heave, off the bottom of the bat, rolls down the track for a single, so Pakistan end on 151, looks a decent score that
